com.microsoft.band.tiles

Class BandTile.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.band.tiles.BandTile.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    BandTile

    public static class BandTile.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class for BandTile objects. Provides a convenient way to set the various fields of a BandTile.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • BandTile.Builder

        public BandTile.Builder(java.util.UUID id,
                java.lang.String name,
                BandIcon icon)
        Constructs a new Builder for creating a BandTile object
        Parameters:
        id - UUID to serve as the tile ID
        name - The name to assign to the tile being created (Cannot be null, empty, pure whitespace, or include more than 21 characters)
        icon - The icon to use as the normal tile icon (Must hold a Bitmap of type Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888 that can be compressed to less than a kilobyte when converted to an alpha only 4-bit Bitmap and put through run-length encoding)

      • BandTile.Builder

        public BandTile.Builder(java.util.UUID id,
                java.lang.String name,
                android.graphics.Bitmap icon)
        Constructs a new Builder for creating a BandTile object
        Parameters:
        id - UUID to serve as the tile ID
        name - The name to assign to the tile being created (Cannot be null, empty, pure whitespace, or include more than 21 characters)
        icon - A Bitmap to be compressed and used as the normal tile icon (Must be of type Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888 and be less than a kilobyte when converted to an alpha only 4-bit Bitmap and put through run-length encoding)

    • Method Detail

      • addPageLayout

        public BandTile.Builder addPageLayout(PageLayout pageLayout)
        Method to add a layout for use by the tile (For creating pages, the indices of the layouts added will be in the order they were added, starting from 0)
        Parameters:
        pageLayout - A PageLayout object to add as a layout for this tile
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if attempting to add more than 5 layouts

        public BandTile.Builder addPageLayout(PagePanel pagePanel)

      • build

        public BandTile build()
        Method to build a BandTile object from the contents of this builder
        Returns:
        A BandTile object from the contents of this builder

      • setPageIcons

        public BandTile.Builder setPageIcons(BandIcon... pageIcons)
        Method to add extra icons to the tile
        Parameters:
        pageIcons - A set of extra icons for use by the tile being created (Each must hold a Bitmap of type Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888 that can be compressed to less than a kilobyte when converted to an alpha only 4-bit Bitmap and put through run-length encoding)
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if passed a null value

      • setPageIcons

        public BandTile.Builder setPageIcons(android.graphics.Bitmap... pageIconBitmaps)
        Method to add extra icons to the tile
        Parameters:
        pageIconBitmaps - A set of Bitmaps to be compressed and used as extra icons for the tile (Each must be of type Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888 and be less than a kilobyte when converted to an alpha only 4-bit Bitmap and put through run-length encoding)
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if passed a null value

      • setPageLayouts

        public BandTile.Builder setPageLayouts(PageLayout... pageLayouts)
        Method to set the layouts to be used by the tile (For creating pages, the indices of these layouts are 0 through 4)
        Parameters:
        pageLayouts - PageLayout objects to add as layouts for this tile
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if setting more than 5 layouts is attempted

      • setScreenTimeoutDisabled

        public BandTile.Builder setScreenTimeoutDisabled(boolean screenTimeoutDisabled)
        Method to set if the screen timeout of the band should be disabled while this tile is opened
        Parameters:
        screenTimeoutDisabled - boolean representing whether the screen timeout of the band should be disabled while this tile is opened
        Returns:
        this

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • setTileSmallIcon

        public BandTile.Builder setTileSmallIcon(BandIcon icon)
        Method to set the small badging icon of the tile being created with badging enabled (i.e. when messages are sent to the tile, the small icon will be shown and an iterating number on the tile will be increased)
        Parameters:
        icon - The icon to use as the small badging icon of the tile being created (Must hold a Bitmap of type Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888 that can be compressed to less than a kilobyte when converted to an alpha only 4-bit Bitmap and put through run-length encoding)
        Returns:
        this

      • setTileSmallIcon

        public BandTile.Builder setTileSmallIcon(BandIcon icon,
                                boolean badgingEnabled)
        Method to set the small badging icon of the tile being created with optional badging
        Parameters:
        icon - The icon to use as the small badging icon of the tile being created (Must hold a Bitmap of type Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888 that can be compressed to less than a kilobyte when converted to an alpha only 4-bit Bitmap and put through run-length encoding)
        badgingEnabled - if true, when messages are sent to the tile, the small icon will be shown and an iterating number on the tile will be increased
        Returns:
        this

      • setTileSmallIcon

        public BandTile.Builder setTileSmallIcon(android.graphics.Bitmap icon)
        Method to set the small badging icon of the tile being created with badging enabled (i.e. when messages are sent to the tile, the small icon will be shown and an iterating number on the tile will be increased)
        Parameters:
        icon - A Bitmap to be compressed and used as the small badging tile icon (Must be of type Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888 and be less than a kilobyte when converted to an alpha only 4-bit Bitmap and put through run-length encoding)
        Returns:
        this

      • setTileSmallIcon

        public BandTile.Builder setTileSmallIcon(android.graphics.Bitmap icon,
                                boolean badgingEnabled)
        Method to set the small badging icon of the tile being created with optional badging
        Parameters:
        icon - A Bitmap to be compressed and used as the small badging tile icon (Must be of type Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888 and be less than a kilobyte when converted to an alpha only 4-bit Bitmap and put through run-length encoding)
        badgingEnabled - if true, when messages are sent to the tile, the small icon will be shown and an iterating number on the tile will be increased
        Returns:
        this
